mapper.select: select bd.no bno ,title ,content ,hit ,to_char(reg_date, 'yy-mm-dd hh24:mi') reg_date ,user_no uno ,ur.id id ,ur.password password ,ur.name user_name ,bd.group_no ,bd.order_no ,bd.depth from rboard bd, users ur where bd.user_no = ur.no order by reg_date desc, group_no DESC, order_no ASC

select bd.no bno ,title ,content ,hit ,to_char(reg_date, 'yy-mm-dd hh24:mi') reg_date ,user_no uno ,ur.id id ,ur.password password ,ur.name user_name ,bd.group_no ,bd.order_no ,bd.depth from rboard bd, users ur where bd.user_no = ur.no and bd.no = #{bno}
